title: CTO
description:
V-FIT is a clothing brand which focus on fit people clothes.

 Robin is responsible for all technology, from which systems to use, planning ongoing development and participate in developing the ecommerce solution.

 Robin has created a customized MVC framework, ecommerce platform and also Admin UI/UX for order handling. The development is based on responsive design to fit all devices like Desktop, Android and iPhone etc.

title: Fullstack developer
description:
Damax is a construction and joinery company based in Östergötland. Before, the workers wrote the entire time sheet on paper sheets.

 Robin created a mobile versioning system for their time tracking based on each week. The system is built to be automatically adapted for all devices such as desktop, android and iOS. The System also includes an administration for the CEO / economist for managing customers, connect order confirmations and send invoices.
skills: Backend, Bootstrap, CSS, Database modelling, Design, Frontend, Fullstack, HTML, Interface design, JavaScript, jQuery, Kanban, MySQL, Photoshop, PHP, Relational databases, UI Design, UX

title: Fullstack developer
description:
Robin worked as both a backend and frontend developer in a scrum team of six people, where they created a new e-commerce solution for Seat Norway.

 He focused on backend with the language PHP, but also did a lot of frontend development in jQuery and KnockoutJS. The frontend development had focus on a responsive design for all devices such as Android, IOS and desktop.
